# Overview

[spverse](https://github.com/nuclearP/spverse) is an R package designed for spatial proteomics data analysis, which integrates four core functional modules: data preprocessing, individual difference assessment and alleviation, local spatial proteomics data analysis, and global spatial proteomics data analysis.

## Supported Analysis

-   *data preprocessing :*

    -   low-quality sample removal

    -   data normalization

    -   missing value imputation

-   *individual difference assessment and alleviation :*

    -   individual difference assessment

    -   individual difference alleviation

    -   dimensionality reduction (PCA, PLS-DA, UMAP)

    -   cluster analysis

-   *local spatial proteomics :*

    -   differential analysis

    -   trend analysis

    -   pathway analysis (GSVA, GSEA)

    -   cell type deconvolution

-   *global spatial proteomics :*

    -   grid definition

    -   spatial autocorrelation analysis (Moranâ€™s I and JCA analysis)

    -   super-resolution analysis
